input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 4.5' Green Medium Washington Frasier Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Evergreen Spruce Traditional Green'
  - Name='LuxenHome 7 ft. Pre-Lit White Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree with Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 5' Flocked British Columbia Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5 ft. Downswept Douglas Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 4.5' Pre-Lit Noble Fir Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Pre-Lit 'Feel Real' Artificial Giant Full Downswept Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions 7.5' Pre-Lit LED Slim Virginia Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='7.5Ft Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Dual Color LED Cosmic Lights By National Tree Company'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Grande Fir Medium Hinged Tree with 750 Clear Lights'
  - Name='Haute Decor 4 Foot Pre-Lit Frosted Ashcroft Fir Potted Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Deluxe Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Tree Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Tree Dual Color LED Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Premier Artificial Christmas Tree with 800 Clear UL listed Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar type of artificial fir tree and function with pre-lit features, but different fir variety and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also pre-lit artificial tree but a slim design and different brand and fir type, less similar silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 4.5' Green Medium Washington Frasier Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree with pre-lit feature but smaller and different fir variety and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Evergreen Spruce Traditional Green
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree but spruce rather than fir with traditional shape; less similarity in branch technology and type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: LuxenHome 7 ft. Pre-Lit White Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree but white colored and unspecified branch technology, less similar in realistic branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree with Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit fir tree but different fir style (Dunhill vs Downswept Douglas).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 5' Flocked British Columbia Mountain Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir tree with flocking, smaller size and different styling but similar overall product category and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5 ft. Downswept Douglas Slim Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar downswept Douglas fir tree with clear lights and same height from identical brand; slimmer but close match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 4.5' Pre-Lit Noble Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller pre-lit fir tree of different fir type and brand, less similar in shape and branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Pre-Lit 'Feel Real' Artificial Giant Full Downswept Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and downswept style using Feel Real technology, but larger size than reference instance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions 7.5' Pre-Lit LED Slim Virginia Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit, slim style but pine rather than fir and different height.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7.5Ft Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Dual Color LED Cosmic Lights By National Tree Company
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and tree type with downswept Douglas fir but with dual-color LED lights and larger height.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel-Real Grande Fir Medium Hinged Tree with 750 Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand with Feel Real technology and clear lights, medium height with hinged branches similar to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 4 Foot Pre-Lit Frosted Ashcroft Fir Potted Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit fir tree but smaller, potted, frosted, and a different brand, less similar in size and construction style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit artificial fir tree of a different shape (flip tree) and brand, moderate similarity in use and core silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Deluxe Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and downswept Douglas fir tree, larger and with dual color LED lights; very close in core construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Tree Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type but slim pencil shape and with dual color LED lights; less full than reference tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Tree Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and fir type but slim pencil shape and with dual color LED lights; less full than reference tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Tree Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate of above product, same reasoning applied.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Downswept Douglas Fir Pencil Slim Tree Dual Color LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate of above product, same reasoning applied.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit flip tree but spruce species and different brand, with a different shape and branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Douglas Fir Premier Artificial Christmas Tree with 800 Clear UL listed Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and species (Douglas fir) pre-lit tree but from different brand, slightly different features and light count.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6ft Pre-Lit Snow-Flocked Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and species but snow-flocked and slim shape from different brand; pre-lit and similar function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Narrow spruce tree from different brand, less similar in species, shape and construction features.
